title: HitmanPro 3.7.14 Build 276 + Patch
description:
Keep[ing Malware off your system and removing Rogue, Fake or Misleading Software, dangerous Keyloggers and other such treats is not an easy task. Luckily, there are many specialized tools with this goal, such as HitmanPro. It a is powerful application that can detect and remove easily most Viruses that could come in contact with your computer.



Cloud-Assisted Virus remover



Right off the bat you can notice a great thing about this utility, namely the fact that it uses a cloud engine when scanning, therefore several Anti-Malware engines are at work to help you find and obliterate any trace of Malicious Code.



Find and remove treats easily



Another neat feature of HitmanPro is the ability to run without installation when needed, so it can be used from a portable storage device. In case you wish to keep it on your system, though, select the option to create a copy of the utility, so you can regularly scan you computer.



The default scan takes a few minutes to complete and you can track the Real-Time progress and view on the spiot any suspicious or dangerous items found in your system. Viruses or other types of computer infections can be either deleted, quarantined, ignored (not recommended) or reported as safe. A small description of each treat is displayed below the files in the list, as well as the level of risk it presents.



Evaluation and conclusion



During my test, HitmanPro managed to find a lot of Tracking Cookies and a couple of suspicious executable files in the Tempiorary Internet Files folder, which weere swiftly removed.



All in all, this application from SurfRight looks and works very well. Even if it may not be suited as a first line of defense. HitmanPro can surely prove a great addition that can work alongside a fully-fledged Anti-Virus solution.



This torrent contains the fowwoling:



- HitmanPro 3.7.14 Build 276 x86
- HitmanPro 3.7.14 Build 276 x64
- Patch



Don't hit and run. A minimum seed time required, the maximum seed time desired. Please seed for as long as you are able to keep this torrent alive!
